marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.airplane_design module¶

Created on Thu Jan 24 23:22:21 2019

Module author: DRUOT Thierry for original Scilab implementation

Module author: PETEILH Nicolas for portage to Python

marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.airplane_design.eval_aerodynamics_design(aircraft)[source]¶

Defines high lift movable deflection settings HLDconf varies from 0 (clean) to 1 (full deflected) Typically :

  • HLDconf = 1 ==> CzmaxLD

  • HLDconf = 0.1 to 0.5 ==> CzmaxTO

marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.airplane_design.eval_aircraft_cg(aircraft)[source]¶

Center of gravity estimation

marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.airplane_design.eval_aircraft_weights(aircraft)[source]¶

Weights estimation

marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.airplane_design.eval_mass_coupling(aircraft)[source]¶

Weights estimation internal coupling This relation is put apart from aircraft_weights because GEMS does not manage functions that compute their own input

marilib.aircraft_model.airplane.airplane_design.eval_payload_mass(aircraft)[source]¶
